DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy IDP-122 Treatment Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter , double-blind , randomize , parallel-group study design ass safety efficacy IDP-122 Lotion comparison vehicle . To eligible study , subject must least 18 year age clinical diagnosis moderate severe psoriasis ( define IGA score 3 4 ) .
